meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>write down</kanji> a lot of stuff focusing on one <kanji>thing</kanji> it's called an <vocabulary>article</vocabulary>. If it's on something that just happened it will probably be a <vocabulary>news story</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
